channel.title: CVE Feed for Agentejo -- Cockpit CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Agentejo -- Cockpit CMS

item.title: CVE-2024-4825|2024-06-05T16:05:02.922Z -- agentejo -- cockpit%20cms
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Agentejo Cockpit CMS v0.5.5 that consists in an arbitrary file upload in ‘/media/api’ parameter via post request. An attacker could upload files to the server, compromising the entire infrastructure.

item.title: CVE-2024-4825|2024-05-13T11:23:20.416Z -- agentejo -- cockpit%20cms
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Agentejo Cockpit CMS v0.5.5 that consists in an arbitrary file upload in ‘/media/api’ parameter via post request. An attacker could upload files to the server, compromising the entire infrastructure.
